# Credentials format

## Algorithmia

File: `algorithmia.json`

```
{
    "apiKey": "simGL9JfATl7e1rMLKst2jbOuqw1"
}
```

## Watson

File: `watson-nlu.json`

```
{
    "apikey": "sHPxp2iunonqIuKYPywnFJfIWPV8-kV0QzAgqjrIwE2u",
    "iam_apikey_description": "Auto generated apikey during resource-key operation for Instance - crn:v1:bluemix:public:natural-language-understanding:us-south:a/cad96a5e91dc4113881752bae091dd88:3f46e54b-3935-4052-ade6-02db183b5d0d::",
    "iam_apikey_name": "auto-generated-apikey-43d18de3-82ae-486a-8244-812364276b4c",
    "iam_role_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam::::serviceRole:Manager",
    "iam_serviceid_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam-identity::a/cad96a5e91dc4113881752bae091dd88::serviceid:ServiceId-46546296-8603-48af-9374-d65c8b20e39e",
    "url": "https://gateway.watsonplatform.net/natural-language-understanding/api"
  }
```
